import React from 'react'; import { Shield, Users, Target, BookOpen, Sparkles, Globe2 } from 'lucide-react'; const AboutUs = () => { const styles = { container: { minHeight: '100vh', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e 0%, #16213e 50%, #0f3460 100%)', color: 'white', fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif', overflowX: 'hidden', paddingBottom: '3rem' }, /* NAVIGATION */ nav: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', padding: '1.5rem 3rem', background: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35)', backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.06)' }, logo: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.5rem', fontSize: '1.5rem', fontWeight: 'bold' }, titleGradient: { background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #00bcd4, #9c27b0, #e91e63)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' }, navLinks: { display: 'flex', gap: '2rem', listStyle: 'none', margin: 0, padding: 0 }, navLink: { color: 'white', textDecoration: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', fontSize: '0.98rem', transition: 'color 0.3s ease' }, /* PAGE LAYOUT */ main: { maxWidth: '1100px', margin: '0 auto', padding: '3rem 1.5rem' }, /* HEADER FIXES: centered subtitle + badges */ pageHeader: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '2rem' }, pageTitle: { fontSize: '3rem', fontWeight: '900', lineHeight: '1.1', marginBottom: '0.75rem' }, pageSubtitle: { fontSize: '1rem', color: '#cccccc', maxWidth: '700px', margin: '0 auto' }, badgeRow: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', gap: '1rem', marginTop: '1.25rem', flexWrap: 'wrap' }, badge: { display: 'inline-flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.5rem', background: 'rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.1)', border: '1px solid rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.4)', borderRadius: '999px', padding: '0.5rem 1rem', fontSize: '0.85rem', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#00e5ff' }, badgePurple: { background: 'rgba(156, 39, 176, 0.15)', border: '1px solid rgba(156, 39, 176, 0.5)', color: '#e1b3ff' }, /* GRID — unchanged */ grid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr))', gap: '1.75rem' }, fullWidthCard: { gridColumn: '1 / -1' }, /* CARD BUBBLES — alignment unchanged */ card: { background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06)', borderRadius: '18px', padding: '1.5rem 2rem', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08)', backdropFilter: 'blur(18px)', boxShadow: '0 18px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.4)', textAlign: 'left' // ← now left-aligned INSIDE the bubble only }, cardHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.6rem', marginBottom: '0.75rem' }, cardTitle: { fontSize: '1.3rem', fontWeight: '700', margin: 0 }, /* TEXT INDENTS */ text: { fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6', marginBottom: '0.75rem', paddingLeft: '0.5rem' // ← indent paragraphs }, list: { paddingLeft: '1.75rem', // ← indent lists margin: 0, color: '#e0e0e0', fontSize: '0.98rem', lineHeight: '1.6' }, listItem: { marginBottom: '0.35rem' }, questionIntro: { paddingLeft: '0.5rem', fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6' }, questionList: { paddingLeft: '1.75rem', // ← indent question list fontSize: '0.98rem', color: '#e0e0e0', lineHeight: '1.6' } }; return (
{/* NAVIGATION */}
CyberSlayers
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Games
{/* PAGE CONTENT */}
{/* HEADER (Centered text & badges) */}

Welcome to CyberSlayers

Learn more about our mission, what we teach, and the team behind the adventure.

Interactive Cybersecurity for Ages 8–16
Story-Driven Digital Safety
{/* CONTENT GRID — bubble alignment unchanged */}
{/* OVERVIEW */}

What Is CyberSlayers?

CyberSlayers is an interactive learning platform designed to teach cybersecurity skills to children ages 8–16 through immersive adventures, story-driven missions, and engaging mini-games. Our goal is to empower the next generation...

{/* MISSION */}

Our Mission

We believe cybersecurity shouldn't be taught through fear or restriction...

{/* WHAT WE TEACH */}

What We Teach

Through story-based lessons... children learn how to:

  • Manage and protect their digital footprint
  • Recognize fake profiles, bots, and impersonation
  • Identify suspicious links, scams, and malicious websites
  • Practice safe browsing on public Wi-Fi
  • Understand cybersecurity consequences
  • Apply habits in real-world situations
{/* HOW IT WORKS */}

How CyberSlayers Works

Our platform blends structured learning with gameplay:

  • Story-driven lessons
  • Interactive quizzes & practice
  • Adventure game worlds
  • Final boss challenge
{/* WHY WE CREATED IT */}

Why We Created CyberSlayers

Today’s children spend more time online than ever...

We asked ourselves:

  • How might we make cybersecurity meaningful?
  • How do we teach students why it matters?
  • How do we ensure they recognize risks?

CyberSlayers is our answer — a platform that teaches real-world...

{/* TEAM */}

Our Team

CyberSlayers is created by a dedicated team:

  • Donato Alvarado
  • Colin Clark
  • Osaruese Okungbowa
  • Stephanie Villela
{/* FUTURE */}

The Future of CyberSlayers

  • More worlds & story arcs
  • Multiplayer challenges
  • Parent/teacher dashboards
  • Real-time role-play scenarios
); }; export default AboutUs;
